Class Main

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
Main
public class Main extends Application
This class launches the application, and contains the start function and the animation timer.

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Launches the application
      Parameters:

    • start

      public void start(Stage primaryStage)
      Creates the Pane that holds the graphical elements, and sets abd shows the stage. This functions also contains the keyboard listeners which control the player's movement.
      Specified by:
      start in class Application
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - the primary stage for this application, onto which the application scene can be set.

    • startGameLoop

      public void startGameLoop()
      Starts the game loop. Contains an animation timer, and implements the Animation timer's handle function.
